string.text: Hide and seek: stay quiet
I have to be quiet, lest I become spotted by the beast, Stronglav.
Hide and seek: speak to Markus
Stronglav is gone. I should speak to Markus.
Desperate decisions: kill the bloodsuckers
The creature is gone, and two bloodsuckers have appeared in its place. Only one of us will escape alive.
Desperate decisions: speak to Markus
Now is a good time to speak to Markus once more.
Exit: find a way out of the hole
I have to find a way out of the hole.
Laboratory X7: find Savage
The Monolith soldier I interrogated has claimed that Savage was taken to the laboratory. He must be in there somewhere.
Laboratory X7: speak to Savage
You have his PDA signal, and now I need to speak to him.
Nightmare dungeon: find a way out of laboratory X7
Remaining here will be a fatal decision. I need to get out of here.
Nightmare dungeon: prepare and detonate explosives to block the passage
Stronglav is still after me. I need to set and detonate the explosives in the room to block the passage so that he cannot leave.
Nightmare dungeon: evacuation
The explosives are ready. Time to get out of here.
Nightmare dungeon: investigation
The stairs have led me to some station. Investigating the area would be my next objective.
